you may be interested in

  • Zecurion Pam
    Privileged access management
    Visual control of power users and prevention of their obuse of privilegies
    • Isolates critical network resources (users do not connect to managed systems directly)
    • Records users logs and video sessions, allows watching them with an interactive player right in the console
    • Controls all popular remote administration protocol including SSH, RDP, HTTP, HTTPS
  • Zecurion Swg
    Secure web gateway
    Web sites acces control and traffic analysis from a single point
    • Easily implemented thanks to ogentless orchitercture
    • Classifies over 500 million URLs with traffic starting from 4 visits per day
    • Distinguishes over 100 web sites categories including unwanted and malware
    • Provides detailed reports on visited web sites with per-user granularity
    • Native integration with Zecurion DLP. Integration with other software via ICAP
  • Zecurion storage security
    Transparent encryption of critical data on Windows servers and storage (SAN, NAS, etc.)
    • 1-day installation the corporate environment without interrupting user operation
    • Remote managment (including emenrgency data destroy vio the phone or application)
    • Separates employee privilegies and reduces the risks of abuse/collusion/theft thanks to a key quorum
    • Requires neither reconfiguring your network or applications, nor user training
